server-config.clientSecret_comment: Needed only when using 'passwordCreds' or 'clientCreds' grantType
server-config.authService_comment: Infinity authentication service alias (when grantType is set to 'authCode')
server-config.cert_and_key_comment: Path to SSL certificate file and SSL key file to use when starting local HTTPS server
server-config.cert_and_key_comment2: Needed only when using 'authCode' grantType and redirectUri begins with 'https://localhost'
server-config.user_and_password_comment: useful primarily when grantType is set to 'passwordCreds'
server-config.questions_comment: useful for designating how frequently questions should be asked during npm run authenticate
